content.rendered:
Please email your enquiries for a same day turnaround to info@gatesandrailingsuk.com. Fabrications to installations as fast as 5 days. Ask for a quote on Automation Electric Gates London

Please call us on 020 8964 2857 anytime.

We specialise in installing, maintaining and repairing all types of automatic electric gates. Swing gates or sliding gates for both domestic and commercial customers.

Call us
Send a message

BIG FERRO PROVIDES A COMPLETE GATE AUTOMATION PACKAGE TO YOUR EXISTING GATES OR TO NEW GATES MANUFACTURED IN OUR WORKSHOP.

For controlling vehicular and pedestrian access, Big Ferro Automation Electric Gates London stand as a vital part of a comprehensive security and access control system. Serving across London, Big Ferro delivers a full suite of services for automatic electric gates. We partner with top-tier suppliers such as BFT, CAME, and FAAC, ensuring impeccable design, fabrication, installation, and automation for every gate.”

For Metal and Wooden Gates

Swing or sliding

High safety standards

Service and maintenance

Contact us now for the best electric gate installation options for your unique requirements.

info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857
info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857

We are gate automation specialists, supplying an extensive range of equipment for electric gates, traffic barriers, rising bollards, intercoms and safety accessories.

COMMERCIAL & INDUSTRIAL GATE SUPPLY

We have a fantastic reputation within the commercial sector due to our understanding of the strict security requirements, and our ability to overcome obstacles and take on a challenge whilst delivering the highest levels of customer service to every customer across London.

We project manage all jobs in-house, from the a site survey all the way through design, manufacture and installation.

RESIDENTIAL AND DOMESTIC GATE INSTALLATION

For all of our automated gates, there are a number of safety considerations that need to be included in the design such as ease of use / access, lane detection circuits, transmitters, keypads and intercoms to name but a few.

In addition to installation, we offer after sales maintenance and a comprehensive breakdown service.

EXTENSIVE RANGE OF SOLUTIONS

  • Security gate automation
  • Sliding gate automation
  • Bifold automation
  • Double gate automation
  • Double leaf security gate automation
  • Metal bi fold gate automation
  • Metal telescopic gate automation
  • Lift arm barrier automation
  • Metal gate automation

FULL RANGE OF ACCESSORIES

Choosing the best motors to open and close your gates and barriers is only the first step towards designing your system; the accessories that you prefer to use and the various safety devices that you need to incorporate to protect you and your property, are the second important choice that you have to make. View our range of: Gate Locks, Battery Backups, and all our other accessories.

SAFETY

Powered gate safety is a hugely important issue for installers, users and owners. All Big Ferro equipment is fully CE marked and supported by both the DHF and Gate Safe organisations. Furthermore, our technical staff have completed both DHF and Gate Safe training so that we can provide you with the best possible advice.

Talk to us about a security gate installation or automated gate repair

Contact Us to get an estimate
